body_html:
i have the same problem when i run apex/example/imagenet/main.py.
the train data is imagenet
my command is python -m torch.distributed.launch --nproc_per_node=2 main.py --fp16 --arch resnet18 --epochs 90 --workers 25 --batch-size=256 /imagenet

PyTorch version: 0.4.1
torchvision version: 0.2.1
OS: Ubuntu 16.04.3 LTS

Python version: 3.6
Is CUDA available: Yes
CUDA runtime version: 9.2
Nvidia driver version: 396.44

GPU 1: Tesla V100-SXM2

body:
i have the same problem when i run apex/example/imagenet/main.py.
the train data is imagenet
my command is `python -m torch.distributed.launch --nproc_per_node=2 main.py --fp16  --arch resnet18 --epochs 90 --workers 25 --batch-size=256 /imagenet`

PyTorch version: 0.4.1
torchvision version: 0.2.1
OS: Ubuntu 16.04.3 LTS

Python version: 3.6
Is CUDA available: Yes
CUDA runtime version: 9.2
Nvidia driver version: 396.44
GPU models and configuration:
GPU 0: Tesla V100-SXM2
GPU 1: Tesla V100-SXM2
